did.abstract: The Knights of Pythias was a fraternal organization in Tombstone, Arizona. Collection includes chiefly receipt stubs for membership dues, 1884-1897. Also includes orders for semi-annual password, 1894-1897, two bills from local firms, petition for membership by Alvin G. Eads, 1906, and miscellaneous letters, 1906-1909.
